message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. Given its high value and quality, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. I am willing to sell it to you for $120. Let me know if this offer suits your budget.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible for you to lower the price to $100?
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $110. Please let me know if this is acceptable.
